_comment: Prototype aircraft for Phase 1. ATR 72-600 is the starting aircraft per prototype-scope.md §8.3

aircraft.name: ATR 72-600
aircraft._specs_comment: Values from prototype-scope.md §8.3 Starting Aircraft Specifications
aircraft._economics_comment: Daily cost ~€3,500 (fuel + crew + mx reserve) - balanced for 60%+ LF profitability. Price reduced to €15M for better pacing (used turboprop value).
aircraft._capacity_comment: 72 seats single class for prototype. No premium classes.
aircraft._notes: Typical route length 300-800 km per prototype-scope.md. Hard to lose money if load factor >50%.
